name: Alpacalips
description:
In this alpaca simulator, play as a grumpy alpaca who doesn't want to be pet by the hordes of small children at the farm. 

This is a 4 levelled game where the player must spit at the enemies to collect the bags of feed they drop on the floor. 

If a child successfully pets the alpaca, he will become to enraged that he bites the child, resulting in some very angry customers that will most likely want him put down... so don't let them touch you!!!

Move - W,A,S,D

Spit - Right Mouse Button
